title: The Second Amendment - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/4/18
itunes:title: The Second Amendment - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/4/18
description:
George Noory and an open lines caller debate whether there will be a push by the government to take guns away from American citizens.
